root.assistant: You are now exploring the contents of a TB unit

tb_001.assistant: To exit the unit type 'exit unit'

status.online: This unit is currently online and performing its designated tasks.

access.assistant: This node is locked. To access it enter the correct password.

observe_move.assistant: The node: 'Movement' has been added to your unit control help section

task.observe_move: Movement observation successful. Movement capabilities have been added to Fox_Unit_001.

about.description: TB units are common worker units. TBs are used to carry and move loads. They use a move, lift and toss module. Their tasks can vary in complexity.
about.Did_you_know: Did you know, TB is said to stand for 'ThrowBro'. Their creator, De Havilland and his friends developed this unit during their college days. It is our oldest unit still in use.

exit.exit_unit: Type 'exit unit' to close this units content.
